channel.title: CVE Feed for wppool -- WP Dark Mode – WordPress Dark Mode Plugin for Improved Accessibility, Dark Theme, Night Mode, and Social Sharing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wppool -- WP Dark Mode – WordPress Dark Mode Plugin for Improved Accessibility, Dark Theme, Night Mode, and Social Sharing

item.title: CVE-2024-5449|2024-06-06T03:32:54.926Z -- wppool -- wp%20dark%20mode%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20dark%20mode%20plugin%20for%20improved%20accessibility%2C%20dark%20theme%2C%20night%20mode%2C%20and%20social%20sharing
item.description: The WP Dark Mode – WordPress Dark Mode Plugin for Improved Accessibility, Dark Theme, Night Mode, and Social Sharing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the wpdm_social_share_save_options function in all versions up to, and including, 5.0.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update the plugin's settings.
